sentences.sContent: Humanitarian aid is being sent to the refugees.
sentences.sCn: 正向难民提供人道主义援助。

sentences.sContent: The well-known humanitarian, Joseph Rowntree, was concerned with the welfare of his employees.
sentences.sCn: 著名的人道主义者约瑟夫.荣特里非常关心其雇员的福利。

synos.tran: 人道主义的；博爱的；基督凡人论的
人道主义者；慈善家；博爱主义者；基督凡人论者

words.tran: 人文主义的；人道主义的
人文主义的；人道主义的
人文主义的；人道主义的
人道地；富人情地；慈悲地
人类；人道；仁慈；人文学科
人道主义者；人类学者，人文学者；人文主义者

trans.tranOther: concerned with improving bad living conditions and preventing unfair treatment of people
a person involved in or connected with improving people's lives and reducing suffering
